TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/ConnectionPointCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: Conecta un control ActiveX a un cliente que controla los eventos del control.

span.span: Connects an ActiveX control to a client that handles the control’s events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Controles ActiveX se comunican con los clientes a través de la interfaz COM.ActiveX controls communicate with clients through their COM interface. El clase proporciona el vínculo entre la clase y el control ActiveX.The class provides the link between the class and the ActiveX control. Para obtener más información, vea "Eventos en COM y los objetos conectables" en MSDN library en http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.For more information, see "Events in COM and Connectable Objects" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public ConnectionPointCookie (object source, object sink, Type eventInterface);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object source, object sink, class System.Type eventInterface) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As Object, sink As Object, eventInterface As Type)
public: ConnectionPointCookie(System::Object ^ source, System::Object ^ sink, Type ^ eventInterface);

param.name: source
param.span: Objeto conectable que contiene puntos de conexión.

span.span: A connectable object that contains connection points.

param.name: sink
param.span: Receptor del cliente que recibe llamadas salientes desde el punto de conexión.

span.span: The client's sink which receives outgoing calls from the connection point.

param.name: eventInterface
param.span: Interfaz saliente cuyo objeto de puntos de conexión se solicita.

span.span: The outgoing interface whose connection point object is being requested.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El constructor establece una conexión entre el control ActiveX y el cliente.The constructor establishes a connection between the ActiveX control and the client.

exception.span: El punto de conexión ha alcanzado su límite de conexión y no puede aceptar más.

span.span: The connection point has already reached its limit of connections and cannot accept any more.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

summary.span: Desconecta el control ActiveX del cliente.

span.span: Disconnects the ActiveX control from the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados usados por la clase .

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método invalida .This method overrides . Código de la aplicación no debe llamar a este método; un objeto `Finalize` método se invoca automáticamente durante la recolección de elementos no utilizados, a menos que se ha deshabilitado la finalización por el recolector de elementos no utilizados mediante una llamada a la método.Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. Para obtener más información, consulte [métodos de finalización y destructores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
